item.name: Spring Rolls (6 pcs)
item.description: One order comes with six spring rolls.

item.name: Salmon Teriyaki and Mixed Vegetables
item.description: All teriyaki dishes are served with steamed rice and mixed vegetables.

item.name: Sushi Party Tray (42 pcs)
item.description: Salmon, tai, surf clam, crab stick, egg, and inari sushi. One order comes with forty-two pieces.
